channel.title: About 2.03 Discussions Category
channel.description: This is a grouping of all previous discussions relating to possible 2.03 proposals - these are now locked to be used as a reference, as the upgrade process has been begun - you can find details of the [timeline here](http://iatistandard.org/202/upgrades/decimal-upgrade-to-2-03), and all the proposals for 2.03 in the category [2.03 Decimal Upgrade Proposals](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/c/standard-management/2-03-decimal-upgrade-proposals) which are now open for comments.

item.title: About 2.03 Discussions Category
item.dc:creator: petyakangalova
item.description:
This is a grouping of all previous discussions relating to possible 2.03 proposals - these are now locked to be used as a reference, as the upgrade process has been begun - you can find details of the timeline here, and all the proposals for 2.03 in the category 2.03 Decimal Upgrade Proposals which are now open for comments.

Read full topic
